mapper.select: SELECT keep.* , lod.lodging_name, lod.addr, lod.certify_img, re.clean_grade, re.accuracy_grade, re.communication_grade, re.location_grade, re.check_in_grade, re.cost_grade FROM keeping keep JOIN lodging lod ON keep.lodging_num = lod.lodging_num JOIN review re ON keep.user_id = re.user_id WHERE keep.user_id = "tester2" and keep.delete_yn = 'N'
